name: Vielklang Audio Metadata File
summary: File generated by vielklang, a digital audio workstation (DAW) plug-in tool used for automatically creating musical harmonies; contains melody properties about an imported audio file (often a .WAV file); includes notes, keys, and tuning frequency information; used by vielklang when computing harmonies.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Image-Line FL Studio with zplane NewTone plug-in
Steinberg Cubase with zplane vielklang plug-in
